sentences.en: At present , however, this is the U.S.'soft rib. "
sentences.cn: 但目前, 这正是我们的 “ 软肋 ”.

sentences.en: For deep hacking cough, treat sides at rib cage.
sentences.cn: 对于深深的乾咳咳嗽, 治疗在胸部肋骨.

sentences.en: He broke a rib when he fell off his horse.
sentences.cn: 他从马上摔下来折断了一根肋骨.

sentences.en: He has broken a rib and the doctor has strapped it up.
sentences.cn: 他断了一根肋骨,医生已包扎好了.

sentences.en: He was punched and kicked in the ribs.
sentences.cn: 他的肋部遭到拳打脚踢。

sentences.en: Hematuria is association with left rib fractures usually means a damaged spleen as well.
sentences.cn: 血尿伴有左侧肋骨骨折通常意味着脾脏也有同样损伤.

sentences.en: My face was covered with bruises and I had a broken rib.
sentences.cn: 我的脸上全是瘀伤，肋骨还断了一根。

sentences.en: Rib meat sheep will be washed, cut into 4 cm square block.
sentences.cn: 将羊肋条肉洗净, 切成4厘米见方的块.

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital with a broken arm and ribs.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊和肋骨断了，被送进医院。

sentences.en: The air cylinder body is a casting, has the radiating rib.
sentences.cn: 气缸体是铸造的, 带有散热肋片.

sentences.en: The doctor fixed the rib, dosed him heavily with drugs, and said he would probably get better.
sentences.cn: 医生接好了肋骨，给他服用了大剂量的药，并说他可能会有所好转。

sentences.en: The goalkeeper was stretchered off just before half-time with a rib injury.
sentences.cn: 就在中场休息前，该守门员由于肋骨受伤被用担架抬下场。

sentences.en: The prize is rib eye steak to take home.
sentences.cn: 奖品是把一块肋眼牛排带回家.

sentences.en: The saw had gone across Gross's left rib cage through the underside of his liver.
sentences.cn: 锯子锯进格罗斯的左胸腔,通过肝脏下方.

sentences.en: They dropped when he attempted to press them to his rib.
sentences.cn: 当他打算把它们按到他的肋下时,它们却溜掉了.

sentences.en: Use a cheap cut such as spare rib chops.
sentences.cn: 用一块便宜点的肉，比如肋排肉。

sentences.en: You've fractured a rib, maybe more than one.
sentences.cn: 你的一根肋骨断了，可能不止一根。

words.tran_cn: 有棱纹的；有肋骨的；呈肋状的
罗纹；凸纹织物；加肋；玩笑
装肋状物于；使起棱纹（rib的过去分词）
装肋状物于；织成罗纹；嘲笑（rib的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 肋骨，（船或屋顶等的）肋拱，肋骨状的东西，（织物的）凸条花纹
trans.tran_en: one of the 12 pairs of curved bones that surround your chest
to furnish or support with a rib or ribs

trans.tran_cn: 嘲笑，逗弄，开（某人的）玩笑，装肋于，给…装肋材
